0$Condition: Schizophrenia$5/28/2019 2:15:52 PM$Reviewer: Emtanner
column2: 65-74 Female  on Treatment for 10 years or more (Patient) $5$5$5$I have been on navane for over 40 years it has been the only medicine that has ever worked for me to live a life to the fullest.

column1: 1$Condition: Mental Disorder with Loss of Normal Personality & Reality$10/18/2015 1:13:04 AM$Reviewer: mermaid
column2: 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient) $5$3$5$I was given this as an adjunct to depressive therapy as as suffering from major depression with psychotic features.  It was very effective as a once moderate daily dose for about 3 years but I had to stop using it due to tardive dyskenesia as well as amenorrhea - I managed to get pregnant twice despite condoms and foam but didn't notice since the drug took my period away after about a year and I hadn't had a period for that time. then found out I was 3 months pregnant
column3: and p[rescribed a therapeutic abortion. This then happened almost immediately afterwards
column4: again... so between that and the twitches and facial spasms I stopped taking the Navane.

column1: 2$Condition: Other$7/8/2013 10:31:37 AM$Reviewer: 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient) $5$5$5$This is one of the few medicines that I have not had terrible side effects with.
3$Condition: Mental Disorder with Loss of Normal Personality & Reality$1/1/2013 12:11:07 AM$Reviewer: MsCherBrow
column2: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient) $5$3$5$Works great for my bi-polar disorder. I did have considerable weight gain and increased prolactin levels.

column1: 4$Condition: Other$8/17/2011 4:01:48 PM$Reviewer: kittygirl1966
column2: 35-44 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient) $5$5$5$I have suffered from depression with psychotic features and have had alot of stress which caused severe agitation. I was first put on Latuda but that was like being in space. Navane has helped me so very much
column3: I would be a mess without it. I was apprehensive about taking it because it is an older drug but works like a charm! I take 10mg in the morning and 15 mg at night to calm thoughts down so I can rest

6$Condition: Mental Disorder with Loss of Normal Personality & Reality$3/12/2011 7:47:46 PM$Reviewer: 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 10 years or more (Patient) $5$3$5$I have been taking navane since the 1970s.  I have only had psychosis when I took myself off it.  I take it because I have tried everything else and I feel safest on this although I do not feel that good on it.
7$Condition: Mental Disorder with Loss of Normal Personality & Reality$10/2/2010 1:56:06 PM$Reviewer: saltydog, 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 10 years or more (Patient) $5$5$5$I have been on this medication for twenty years for bipolar disorder. I have found it very effective with few side effects. It is far superior to many of the newer psych medications. It is an old medication but one of the best.
8$Condition: Mental Disorder with Loss of Normal Personality & Reality$7/11/2010 11:42:28 PM$Reviewer: 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient) $5$5$5$With Risperdal if I missed a treatment, the hallucinations would begin again,but withthis medicine I don't even think about weird ideas.  It's great. I had been told by someone that non-name brands didn't work, but they were wrong. (I'm on generic).
9$Condition: Schizophrenia$5/4/2010 6:55:08 AM$Reviewer: frankie2, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient) $3$3$5$I have been on navane now for about 2 years it works ok i guess it has made me gain a lot of weight so be careful also you cant take a LOT OF MEDS ON IT every thing interacts with it.

12$Condition: Other$8/17/2009 12:20:54 PM$Reviewer: Elizabeth, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient) $1$1$1$I was MISDIAGNOSED as a schizophrenic at age 21 by Astrid Dublis.  The drug made me exhausted
column2: caused my skin to discolor--and it never quite returned to its original color
column4: and persistent motor restlessness that was AGONIZING. The shrink kept making snide comments about my weight but never told me that Navane caused that.  Also
column5: she never told me I had been diagnosed as schizophrenic but she did tell my family
column7: even though I was over 21 at the time.

column1: This drug is HELL.
Unless you are a schizophrenic who is in danger of killing someone and going to prison because of your illness
column2: NEVER
column4: be careful of your liver while you take it: don't drink at all and avoid acetominophen. This drug inhibits the enzyme needed to metabolize antidepressants so if you are given an antidepressant as well

column1: 13$Condition: Schizophrenia$7/19/2009 10:39:09 PM$Reviewer: 35-44 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient) $3$1$4$This stuff is sinister. They plug just about everyone with this in the onset stages of schizophrenia. Horrible side effects
column2: especially painful muscle pulling and involuntary movement. get on someting else.

column2: 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Caregiver) $5$5$5$My sister is taking this in the 5 mg capsules
column3: it is the only drug that has effectively treated her disorder.  She was just told upon filling her prescription that it will no longer be available.  She has had many breakthroughs on the previous drugs they have tried to use to treat her before.  Has anyone out there had any success with a replacement for thiothixene before?  She is extremely worried that she will not be able to fing an effective replacement
